title: #465: How I Met Your Mother (OOTP 28, Snape's Worst Memory)
description:
• WizardingWorld.com is hosting a video reread of Sorcerer's Stone and Daniel Radcliffe kicks things off!
  • Don't miss Quizzitch Live: The Goblet of Popcorn next Sunday, May 17 (11 am ET)!
  • The MuggleCast 15th Anniversary T-Shirt is here! Become a Patron by June 30 at the Dumbledore's Army level or higher to get yours! 
  • Muggle Mail covers Ministry toilet access, Hermione's advice to Harry and memory perspective!
  • Chapter-by-Chapter continues with Order of the Phoenix – Chapter 28: Snape's Worst Memory
  • 7-Word Summary: Discoveries are difficult to watch in Pensieve 
  • Why didn't Professor McGonagall take over as Headmistress?
  • We reveal something in Hogwarts that ISN'T a security nightmare!
  • The Inquisitorial Squad
  • The Weasley Twins, their loyalty to Dumbledore and their ability to perform exceptional magic
  • Connecting The Threads between Montague and the Vanishing Cabinet
  • Is it fair that Filch is Caretaker of Hogwarts when he can't perform magic?
  • Drink up! Could Umbridge's attempts be any more obvious?
  • As far as apologies go, where does Cho's rank?
  • Inside Snape’s Worst Memory: should Harry have taken this magical leap?
  • How does time work inside people's memories?
  • Why doesn't Harry recognize his mother's initials?
  • Why does Harry see this memory from the third person? Why does he have such freedom of movement?
  • We analyze the younger versions of James, Sirius, Lupin, Peter, Lily and Snape
  • How are the Marauders any different than Malfoy, Crabbe and Goyle?
  • Is it Snape's Worst Memory because he calls Lily a mudblood?
  • We discuss the future implications this scene has for both James and Harry
  • The Umbridge Suck Count climbs to 80!
  • The hosts give their MVP of the Week and Rename The Chapter!
  • Quizzitch: What punishment does Umbridge instruct Filch to apply to the Weasley Twins for their Swamp?
  • Workout at home and see great results with BeachBody On Demand! Text 'mugglecast' to 30-30-30 to receive a free trial!
  • Join our community at Patreon.com/MuggleCast and receive magical benefits, including Bonus MuggleCast!
itunes:author: Harry Potter
